language.label: Language:-C
language.title: Select Language-C
language.instructions: Select the language you wish to use for this application.-C

errors.wslError: The application encountered an error with WSL authentication. It will continue in offline mode, using local cached data, unless you click the red 'nonAuthenticated' text in the heading to reauthenticate.-C

conflictNotification.recordUpdatedConflict: The {{item}} you are editing has been updated by someone else. Click 'Ok' to refresh the latest data and make your changes again.-C
conflictNotification.recordDeletedConflict: The {{item}} you are editing has been deleted by someone else. Click 'Ok' to return to the List Booking page.-C
conflictNotification.offlineUpdateConflict: The following {{item}} could not be updated because another user has edited {{pronoun}} while you were offline.-C
conflictNotification.offlineDeleteConflict: The following {{item}} could not be deleted because another user has deleted {{pronoun}} while you were offline.-C

listBooking.title: List Bookings-C
listBooking.instructions: The existing bookings are listed below. You may create new bookings or search for existing ones.-C
listBooking.customerInstructions: Your bookings are listed below. Please contact your agent for information about updating or canceling your bookings.-C
listBooking.subTitle: Bookings-C

deleteBooking.title: Delete Bookings-C
deleteBooking.instructions: The following bookings will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to continue?-C

updateBooking.title: Update Booking-C
updateBooking.instruction: Use this form to update your booking options.-C
updateBooking.updateQueued: Booking update has been queued for later processing due to being offline.-C
updateBooking.recordUpdatedConflict: The Booking you are editing has been updated by someone else. Click 'Ok' to refresh the latest data and make your changes again.-C
updateBooking.recordDeletedConflict: The Booking you are editing has been deleted by someone else. Click 'Ok' to return to the List Booking page.-C
updateBooking.offlineUpdateConflict: The following Booking could not be updated because another user has edited it while you were offline.-C
updateBooking.offlineDeleteConflict: The following Booking could not be deleted because another user has deleted it while you were offline.-C

criteria.instruction: Please specify your search criteria and click 'Search'.-C

results.instruction: Please enjoy these results tailored to your query.-C
results.noResultsAvailableMessage: The results of this search are no longer available.  Please -C

searchBooking.noResultsFoundMessage: No results matched your criteria.  Please adjust your criteria and try again.-C

createBooking.title: Create Booking-C

stepOne.instruction: Begin by entering the customer's email address.-C

stepTwo.instruction: Select an adventure type and a corresponding adventure.-C

stepThree.instruction: Specify the start and end dates for this adventure.-C

stepSix.instruction: Review the booking details below. To make corrections, click on the previous button. If all details are correct, click Book Adventure.-C

createBooking.createQueued: Booking creation has been queued for later processing due to being offline.-C
createBooking.validationErrors: Errors found on this page. Please see below for details.-C
createBooking.adventureQueuedLocally: {{customerEmailId}}'s {{adventureType}} adventure beginning on {{startDay}} queued for save locally.-C

listAgent.title: Manage Agents-C
listAgent.instruction: A list of travel agents appears below. You can create a new agent or update an existing agent.-C

updateAgent.title: Update Agent-C
updateAgent.recordUpdatedConflict: The agent you are editing has been updated by someone else.  Click 'Ok' to refresh the latest data and make your changes again.-C
updateAgent.recordDeletedConflict: The agent you are editing has been deleted by someone else. Click 'Ok' to return to the List Agents page.-C
updateAgent.offlineUpdateConflict: The following agent could not be updated because another user has edited them while you were offline.-C
updateAgent.offlineDeleteConflict: The following agent could not be deleted because another user has deleted them while you were offline.-C

createAgent.title: Create Agent-C
createAgent.instruction: Specify the following information for a travel agent.-C
createAgent.reviewInstruction: Review the agent details below. To make corrections, click on the previous button. If all details are correct, click 'Save.'-C
createAgent.name: Name-C
createAgent.certificationsInstruction: Use the "Add Certification" button to add a new certification for agent - {{firstName}} {{lastName}}.-C
createAgent.birthYearError: Please enter a valid birth year.-C
createAgent.birthYearBefore18Error: The agent must be at least 18 years old.-C
createAgent.invalidCertificationError: The Birth Year must be before the Certification Year.-C

certification.title: Add Certification-C
certification.instructions: Please enter the certification information below.-C
certification.removeMessage: Please confirm removal of this certification. This action cannot be undone.-C

deleteAgent.title: Delete Agents -C
deleteAgent.instructions: The following agents will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to continue? -C
